sections.heading: Transferred to Chapter 245c, Sec
sections.text: 13b-387.Section 16-281a. - Transfer of powers and duties.Section 16-282 to 16-308. - Transferred to Chapter 245c, Secs. 13b-388 to 13b-414, inclusive.

sections.heading: Transfer of powers and duties.
sections.text:
Section 16-281a is repealed, effective June 6, 2014.

(P.A. 88-249, S. 2, 9; P.A. 11-80, S. 1; P.A. 14-134, S. 130.)

sections.heading: to 16-308. - Transferred to Chapter 245c, Secs. 13b-388 to 13b-414, inclusive.
